author: Claudia L√∂we
title: Beatrice Egli privat: Dieses traurige Krebsschicksal pr√§gte die DSDS-Jurorin f√ºrs Leben | news.de
text:
Im Jahr 2013 ging am Musikhimmel ein neuer Stern auf: Beatrice Egli hie√ü die Neuentdeckung, die bei "Deutschland sucht den Superstar" den ersten Platz in der zehnten Staffel belegte. Doch wie lebt die Castingshow-Gewinnerin eigentlich, wenn sie nicht gerade bei Konzerten auf der B√ºhne steht oder im Studio neue Songs aufnimmt?
Beatrice Egli im Steckbrief
- Name: Beatrice Margerite Egli
- Geburtsdatum und -ort: 21. Juni 1988 in Pf√§ffikon, Freienbach (Schweiz)
- Sternzeichen: Zwillinge
- Gr√∂√üe: 1,63 Meter
- Augenfarbe: gr√ºn-blau
Familie: Eltern Ida und Bruno Egli-Keller, zwei √§ltere Br√ºder namens Lukas und Kari, ein j√ºngerer Bruder namens Marcel- bekannt aus (Auswahl): Siegerin bei "Deutschland sucht den Superstar" 2013, "Schlager sucht Liebe" (2019), "MasterChef Celebrity" (2020), "Sing meinen Song - Das Schweizer Tauschkonzert" (2021), "Die Beatrice Egli Show" (seit 2022), "Verstehen Sie Spa√ü?" (2024), Jurorin bei "Deutschland sucht den Superstar" (2024)
- Autogrammadresse: Beatrice Egli, Postlagernd, CH-8808 Pf√§ffikon SZ
Beatrice Egli: Musik ist ihr Leben seit der Kindheit
Eines steht fest: Die Musik war f√ºr Beatrice Egli bereits vor "Deutschland sucht den Superstar" ein wichtiger Faktor. Die im Sommer 1988 im Schweizer Kanton Schwyz geborene Blondine entstammt einer Familie musikalischer Talente und tr√§llerte bereits im zarten Alter von neun Jahren mit Leidenschaft. Ab ihrem 14. Lebensjahr bekam Beatrice Margerite Egli, so hei√üt die S√§ngerin mit vollem Namen, Gesangsunterricht und stand erstmals auf der B√ºhne, wenn auch vorerst "nur" auf kleineren Events.
Lesen Sie auch:
Beatrice Egli: Ihre Familie mit Mama Ida, Papa Bruno und den Br√ºdern Marcel, Kari und Lukas geht ihr √ºber alles
Beruflich ging es f√ºr Beatrice Egli trotzdem erst einmal in eine andere Richtung: Die Schweizerin lie√ü sich zur Fris√∂rin ausbilden und arbeitete einige Monate in diesem Beruf, bevor die Lust auf die B√ºhne doch st√§rker wurde. 2011 hatte Beatrice Egli ihren Abschluss als Schauspielerin in der Tasche, nachdem sie an der Schule f√ºr Schauspiel in Hamburg die Schulbank dr√ºckte. Doch ihrem Heimatort Pf√§ffikon blieb die K√ºnstlerin weiter verbunden: Erst 2016 zog sie in ihre eigene Wohnung, zuvor lebte sie gemeinsam mit ihrer Familie, zu der neben einem j√ºngeren Bruder Marcel auch zwei √§ltere Br√ºder namens Lukas und Kari geh√∂ren, in ihrem Elternhaus samt Mama Ida und Papa Bruno.
Beatrice Egli konnte diese Erfolge als S√§ngerin verbuchen
Im Laufe ihrer musikalischen Karriere hat Beatrice Egli schon so manche Sternstunde erlebt. Mit der ber√ºhmten Schweizer S√§ngerin Lys Assia stand das Nachwuchstalent vor elf Jahren auf der B√ºhne und schaffte es mit dem Duett "Sag mir wo wohnen die Engel" auf den ersten Platz zum Vorentscheid zum "Grand Prix der Volksmusik" f√ºr die Schweiz. Weitere Auftritte absolvierte die Schweizerin beim "Herbstfest der Volksmusik" und im "Musikantenstadl", um nur einige zu nennen - erst danach folgte mit der Teilnahme bei "Deutschland sucht den Superstar" der endg√ºltige Durchbruch.
Die Castingshow brachte Beatrice Egli nicht nur die n√ºtzliche Bekanntschaft mit Dieter Bohlen ein, der unter anderem f√ºr ihre erste Single "Mein Herz" verantwortlich zeichnete, sondern auch rasante Abs√§tze bei Plattenverk√§ufen sowie Top-Positionen in den Charts in √ñsterreich, Deutschland und der Schweiz. Begehrte Musikpreise wie der "Echo" oder den Schweizer Schlagerpreis "Prix Walo" kr√∂nten die Erfolge von Beatrice Egli.
Ist Beatrice Egli aktuell Single nach der Trennung von Freund Reto?
Doch was macht eine K√ºnstlerin wie Beatrice Egli privat au√üer ihre Gold- und Platin-Platten abzustauben? Gibt es vielleicht einen Mann in ihrem Leben, der ihr Herz h√∂her schlagen l√§sst? Immer wieder wird die blonde S√§ngerin in Interviews √ºber ihr Privatleben ausgequetscht - seit der Trennung von ihrem Freund Reto, mit dem sie von 2009 bis 2014 liiert war, h√§ufen sich die neugierigen Fragen sogar. Derzeit scheint die erfolgreiche S√§ngerin als Single durchs Leben zu gehen, wie Medienberichte nahelegen - doch eine attraktive Power-Frau wie Beatrice Egli d√ºrfte sich √ºber mangelndes m√§nnliches Interesse garantiert nicht beschweren.
Beatrice Egli k√§mpft gegen Brustkrebs - aus diesem traurigen Grund
Ihre freie Zeit nutzt Beatrice Egli jedoch nicht nur f√ºr Hobbys, sondern auch f√ºr ernste Dinge, die der Schweizerin am Herzen liegen. Eines davon ist der Kampf gegen Brustkrebs. Bei diversen Events trat die S√§ngerin als Botschafterin f√ºr die sogenannte Pink-Ribbon-Bewegung auf und r√ºhrte flei√üig die Werbetrommel f√ºr Vorsorgeuntersuchungen, um der heimt√ºckischen Krebserkrankung den Schrecken zu nehmen. Der Grund f√ºr Beatrice Eglis Engagement gegen Brustkrebs ist dabei ein ganz pers√∂nlicher: Wie das Schweizer Portal "Blick" berichtete, starb eine Tante der S√§ngerin an Brustkrebs.
"Nat√ºrlich!" auf Platz 1 der Schweizer Album-Charts
Ende des Jahres 2018 nahm sich die Blondine dann eine scheinbar l√§ngst √ºberf√§llige Auszeit und verbrachte drei Monate in Australien. Mit wieder aufgeladenen Batterien im Gep√§ck, ver√∂ffentlichte sie im Sommer 2019 ihr neuestes Studio-Album "Nat√ºrlich!", welches in der Schweiz auf die Spitze der Album-Charts schoss.
"Schlager sucht Liebe" floppt im deutschen Fernsehen
Die am 16. Juni 2019 erstmals ausgestrahlte RTL-Sendung "Schlager sucht Liebe", welche von Beatrice Egli moderiert wurde, wurde nicht wirklich gut angenommen von den Fans und k√§mpfte mit schlechten Einschaltquoten. Die Sendung floppte, aber im Herbst 2019 durfte sich Beatrice Egli wieder in einer neuen Show bei RTL Plus beweisen. Zusammen mit Eloy de Jong moderiert sie "Ich find' Schlager toll". Ab dem 15. April 2023 bekommt sie ihre erste eigene Sendung, die "Beatrice Egli Show". Im Herbst 2024 ist Beatrice Egli neben Dieter Bohlen, Loredana und Pietro Lombardi als Jurorin in der 21. Staffel von "Deutschland sucht den Superstar" bei RTL zu sehen.

loc/kjf/bua/news.de
Erfahren Sie hier mehr √ºber die journalistischen Standards und die Redaktion von news.de.

author: none@none.com (Web Desk)
title: New cold wave set to envelop Karachi
text:
New cold wave set to envelop Karachi
A severe cold wave is gripping the nation, with an increase in cold intensity anticipated in Karachi starting January 4.
Reports indicated that freezing temperatures continue to affect most cities, while Skardu experiences ongoing snowfall and Ghizer is blanketed in white.
In Kalam, lakes and waterfalls have frozen due to the extreme cold. Several areas in Balochistan have also seen rainfall, with temperatures plummeting to minus 9 degrees Celsius in Skardu and minus 8 degrees Celsius in Layyah.
Dense fog in Punjab and Sindh has led to the closure of multiple motorways, creating travel difficulties for many.
The Pakistan Meteorological Department forecasted dry weather to persist across Punjab, including Lahore, although a rain-bearing system is expected to enter Pakistan tomorrow.
Most districts in Punjab, including Lahore, may see rain, with additional rainfall anticipated on January 5, likely intensifying the cold conditions.
Severe fog is expected to continue during the mornings and evenings in Punjab, further hampering travel. In Lahore, minimum temperatures have been recorded at 6 degrees Celsius, with a maximum expected to reach around 15 degrees Celsius.
Read more
[Severe cold wave grips Pakistan as snow covers mountainous regions]
[Meteorological department forecasts rain, snowfall across the country]
Rain-wind with snowfall is expected in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Gilgit-Baltistan, Kashmir, Murree, Galliyat. Snowfall may cause road closures/ slippery conditions and landsliding/avalanches in hilly areas on January 6.

@Aaj_Urdu.

Facebook,
Instagram
and
YouTube.

title: ActivatedYou Essential Skin Food Reviews: The Best Formula for Radiant Skin Support
text:
ActivatedYou Essential Skin Food Reviews: The Best Formula for Radiant Skin Support
Discover the Plant-Based Formula Backed by Real Results‚ÄîActivatedYou Essential Skin Food Supports Smoother, Firmer, Radiant-Looking Skin Naturally
/EIN News/ -- New York City, April 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) --
Is This the Key to Radiant Skin?
Are you trying to unlock the secret to more radiant and youthful-looking skin? Then you might have heard about ActivatedYou Essential Skin Food, the supplement that's creating hype in the beauty and wellness community.
With a blend of plant-based compounds aimed at nourishing your skin from within, Essential Skin Food reviews are buzzing with reports of plumper, more hydrated, brighter-looking skin and a softening in the appearance of lines. Read on to learn more.
Ingredients
ActivatedYou is a brand rooted in integrative medicine, blending Eastern remedies with Western science. Essential Skin Food is defined by a rich blend of such ingredients, each playing a pivotal role in helping to enhance skin health.
These power players include:
-
Vitamin C(antioxidant ascorbic acid) - Calcium (as Dicalcium Phosphate)
-
Amino Acid Complex (
L-Lysine HCIand L-Proline amino acids) -
Dermaval‚Ñ¢ Blend (Pomegranate Extract, Asparagus, Okra, CoffeeBerry¬Æ Extract, Quercetin,
Acerola Extract, Maltodextrin, Acai, Mangosteen, Camu Camu) - Cosmythic‚Ñ¢
French Maritime Pine Bark Extract
Together, these ingredients form a harmonious blend that targets key aspects of skin health, including helping to:
- Defeat skin-damaging free radicals for a brighter-looking complexion
- Boost the skin's natural "plumpness"
- Promote the skin's appearance, with fewer visible fine lines and wrinkles
- Encourage cell turnover for radiant, smoother-looking skin
- Fight elastin breakdown to help promote more visible skin firmness
Analyzing the Results: Essential Skin Food Reviews
The potential benefits of ActivatedYou Essential Skin Food are seen across many real-world results. With an overwhelming wave of positive feedback in Essential Skin Food Reviews, users rave about the positive changes in their skin's tone, clarity, and texture. Many describe a visible reduction in signs of aging, such as wrinkles and fine lines, while others mention the compliments they've received on their overall appearance. Some have even pointed out additional benefits, like digestion and nail support.
Sharon writes, "First noticed smoothing of crows feet around eyes and marionette lines around the mouth. My face feels smoother and softer, but all over my body as well. My fingernails are noticeably smoother, and small ridges are beginning to disappear. I am waiting for the longer-term results, hoping to see sunspots fading. I'm convinced!"
Michelle says, "[...] I had not seen my family in a while, and they thought I had my eyes done! I have seen a lot of improvement in my crow's feet and the sagging skin of my eyelids. It is remarkable, my confidence is better, and I don't feel like I am looking at an old woman in the mirror anymore [...]."
Tammy comments, "[...] For the first time in more than five years, I had more compliments on my skin than when I was in my 30s. Thank you for that."
ActivatedYou Discounts and Offers
Health and wellness supplements can be heavy on the wallet, so who doesn't love a good deal? ActivatedYou loves to help customers maximize their savings with special promotions and discounts. There are always "bundle discounts" on the ActivatedYou website. Signing up for a FREE VIP account allows deeper discounts and special promos.

Ordering Essential Skin Food
Essential Skin Food is available online from the ActivatedYou website. Several packages are available, with discounts increasing if you order in bulk. The biggest discounts are available if you sign up for a free membership.

Orders over $49 get free shipping; a 90-day money-back guarantee covers all orders. If you aren't happy with your results, please contact customer service for more information about the return policy or if you have any other questions.
Frequently Asked Questions
Q: Is Essential Skin Food Right For Me?
A: If you've noticed your skin losing its luster, developing fine lines, or feeling less firm over time, Essential Skin Food could be a suitable addition to your daily routine. The supplement is designed for individuals aiming to help support their body's natural collagen production while enhancing skin appearance and texture.
Q: Does Essential Skin Food contain any animal-based collagen?
A: No, Essential Skin Food contains absolutely no animal-based ingredients. It contains 100% premium, plant-based compounds, like vitamins, minerals, herb extracts, and essential amino acids, designed to help support the skin's collagen production.
Q: How Do I Take Essential Skin Food?
A: Simply take one easy-to-swallow capsule with a full glass of water once a day. Consistency is key. To get the most out of Essential Skin Food, you should drink plenty of water, maintain a balanced diet rich in antioxidants and vitamins, and always wear sunscreen.
Q: Does Essential Skin Food Have A Money-Back Guarantee?
A: If you're hesitant to try a new supplement, rest assured that Essential Skin Food has a robust 90-day 100% purchase price guarantee. This means you can test the waters without worry. If, for any reason, you're not entirely satisfied with the results, they'll issue a full refund of your purchase price (minus shipping) ‚Äî even if you've used the entire supply!

Recomendaciones

author: Daily News Hungary
title: PM Orb√°n greets ethnic Hungarians ahead of 15 March national holiday
text:
Prime Minister Viktor Orb√°n has greeted ethnic Hungarians in a letter to be read out at celebrations around the world marking the March 15 national holiday.
‚ÄúWe will not give up any of our national independence either for the friendship or the threats of anyone,‚Äù the prime minister‚Äôs letter said.
Orb√°n‚Äôs letter ‚ÄúThe Hungarian nation became a flag-bearer of freedom in 1848,‚Äù Orb√°n said. ‚ÄúThe young rebels of March demanded not only a responsible government, the abolishment of censorship, and equality before the law, but they also wanted to live in a Europe where nations work together to prosper side-by-side, and not on the ruins of others.‚Äù
‚ÄúThey believed that freedom is not an end in itself and it is not the freedom of the strong above the weak, nor the freedom of the majority above the minority, but above all, its purpose is to bring peace, security and wellbeing to all people,‚Äù he said.
‚ÄúThe spiritual heritage they left behind, stamped with their personal sacrifice, is that we will not give up any of our national independence either for the friendship or the threats of anyone,‚Äù the letter said.
Orb√°n added that ‚Äúthe lights of the watch fires of Hungarian freedom‚Äù could be seen from afar. ‚ÄúThey advocate that we Hungarians ask and demand the return of a free, dignified and strong Europe, one that could maintain peace in its territory, and resolutely stood up against all open or concealed attempts to abolish the language and culture of indigenous minorities,‚Äù he said.
‚ÄúLet there be peace, freedom and consensus,‚Äù he concluded.
Pot√°pi inaugurates Pet≈ëfi statue in Vojvodina Commemorations of the 1848-49 revolution and war of independence would be inconceivable without thinking of Sandor Petofi, the state secretary for Hungarian communities abroad said in Vojvodina, inaugurating a statue of the 19th century revolutionary and poet. Pet≈ëfi ‚Äúis proof that being Hungarian is a matter of identity and not a matter of origin,‚Äù √Årp√°d J√°nos Pot√°pi said.
Pot√°pi inaugurates Pet≈ëfi statue in Vojvodina. Source: MTI/Moln√°r Edv√°rd
He said Hungarian communities, no matter where they lived in the world, were linked by their common language, culture and history, especially when celebrating national holidays.
Four Petofi statues were inaugurated in Vojvodina this year and last as part of programmes dubbed Move!Pet≈ëfi! marking the 200th anniversary of the poet‚Äôs birth.
Petofi is considered Hungary‚Äôs national poet, and was one of the key figures of the Hungarian Revolution of 1848.
Read also:
Warning: Budapest traffic restrictions for 15 March national holiday Hungarian defence minister Szalay-Bobrovniczky: Future belongs to free nations

author: Lucas Lage Villela
title: C√¢mara Internacional de Neg√≥cios busca estreitar la√ßos entre Brasil e Col√¥mbia
text:
A C√¢mara Internacional de Neg√≥cios anunciou a abertura da C√¢mara de Com√©rcio Brasil-Col√¥mbia (CCBC). O objetivo √© transformar as respectivas fronteiras em neg√≥cios pr√≥speros.
A abertura da CCBC foi impulsionada pelo grande potencial desse mercado para os empres√°rios brasileiros. Segundo a C√¢mara Internacional de Neg√≥cios, ao longo dos anos, a institui√ß√£o ajudou mais de 100 empresas a estabelecerem neg√≥cios com a Col√¥mbia.
A Col√¥mbia √© uma porta de entrada importante para o com√©rcio com outros pa√≠ses da Am√©rica Latina. Al√©m disso, mant√©m flexibiliza√ß√µes comerciais com outras pot√™ncias econ√¥micas, como os Estados Unidos e Canad√°.
Leia mais: Franquias brasileiras apostam em internacionaliza√ß√£o dos neg√≥cios A expans√£o de neg√≥cios para a Col√¥mbia, impulsionada pela CCBC, deve beneficiar diversas ind√∫strias e setores. A iniciativa surge para conectar os interesses do setor privado √†s diretrizes do setor p√∫blico, consolidando um ambiente favor√°vel ao com√©rcio exterior e ao desenvolvimento da economia.

author: Jessica Brown
title: Rescue underway for injured bushwalker at Glenrock Yuelerbah
text:
A LARGE-SCALE rescue operation has been launched at Glenrock State Conservation Area to extract an injured bushwalker after she slipped and fell down a waterfall.
It is understood a woman aged in her 30s had been on the Yuelarbah Track on Thursday March 13, when she edged close to Flaggy Creek before losing her footing and falling over the waterfall's edge.
Emergency services were called to the incident at 10.50am. According to initial reports from a NSW Ambulance spokesperson, the woman fell the height of two-storeys.
Police, paramedics and NSW Fire and Rescue were called to the scene. The Westpac Rescue Helicopter has also been tasked to the Glenrock area and was expected to winch her out of the bushaldn about 12.30pm.
Teams had to reach the injured woman on foot, before she was treated by paramedics at the scene and moved onto a spinal board. She is conscious and breathing, but has suffered a head ad arm injury in the fall.
The helicopter extraction is expected to take place at 1.30pm.
The Yuelarbah walking track is part of the Great North walk that stretches 250km from Newcastle to Sydney. The track follows along Flaggy Creek, through wet gullies and coastal rainforest, and includes two waterfalls before finishing at Glenrock Beach.
Do you know more? Email news tips to news@newcastleherald.com.au

ÊñáÁ´†È¶ñÂèë‰∫é‚ÄúË∞≠Êµ©‰øä‚ÄùÔºåÊ¨¢ËøéÂ§ßÂÆ∂Âú®ÊúãÂèãÂúàÂíåÂæÆ‰ø°Áæ§ËΩ¨Âèë„ÄÇÂÖ¨‰ºóÂè∑ÂèäÂÖ∂‰ªñÂπ≥Âè∞ËΩ¨ËΩΩËØ∑Âú®ÂêéÂè∞ÁïôË®Ä„ÄÇ
ÂΩ≠ÂçöÁ§æ8Êúà12Êó•ÂºïËø∞Áü•ÊÉÖ‰∫∫Â£´Êä•ÈÅìÔºåËøáÂéªÂá†Âë®Ôºå‰∏≠ÂõΩÊúâÂÖ≥ÈÉ®Èó®Â∑≤ÂêëÂ§öÂÆ∂ÂÖ¨Âè∏ÂèëÂá∫ÈÄöÁü•ÔºåÂäùÈòªÂÆÉ‰ª¨ÈÅøÂÖç‰ΩøÁî®Ëã±‰ºüËææÁöÑH20ËäØÁâáÔºåËøôÊòØ‰∏ÄÁßçÊäÄÊúØÂê´ÈáèËæÉ‰ΩéÁöÑËäØÁâá„ÄÇÁü•ÊÉÖ‰∫∫Â£´ËøòËØ¥ÔºåÁõ∏ÂÖ≥ÊåáÂØºÊñπÈíàÁâπÂà´Âº∫ÁÉàÂú∞Á¶ÅÊ≠¢ÂõΩÊúâ‰ºÅ‰∏öÊàñÁßÅËê•ÂÖ¨Âè∏Â∞ÜH2OËäØÁâáÁî®‰∫é‰ªª‰Ωï‰∏éÊîøÂ∫úÊàñÂõΩÂÆ∂ÂÆâÂÖ®Áõ∏ÂÖ≥ÁöÑÂ∑•‰Ωú„ÄÇ
Êä•ÈÅìÁß∞ÔºåÊúâÂÖ≥ÊñπÈù¢Âú®ÂèëÁªôÈÉ®ÂàÜ‰ºÅ‰∏öÁöÑ‰ø°‰ª∂‰∏≠ÊèêÂá∫‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÁ≥ªÂàóÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ‰æãÂ¶ÇÔºå‰∏∫‰ªÄ‰πà‰ºÅ‰∏öÈÄâÊã©Ëã±‰ºüËææH20ËäØÁâáËÄå‰∏çÊòØÂõΩ‰∫ßËäØÁâáÔºüËÄÉËôëÂà∞‰∏≠ÂõΩÂõΩÂÜÖÂ∏ÇÂú∫Êúâ‰ºóÂ§öÈÄâÊã©ÔºåËøôÊòØÂê¶‰∏∫ÂøÖË¶ÅÈÄâÊã©Ôºü‰ª•Âèä‰ºÅ‰∏öÊòØÂê¶ÂèëÁé∞Ëã±‰ºüËææÁ°¨‰ª∂Â≠òÂú®‰ªª‰ΩïÂÆâÂÖ®ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåÁ≠âÁ≠â„ÄÇ
Áî±‰∫éÊòØÂΩ≠ÂçöÁ§æÂèëÂ∏ÉÁöÑÊ∂àÊÅØÔºåÊ≠£Á°Æ‰∏éÂê¶ÔºåÈúÄË¶ÅÂàÜÊûêÂíåÂà§Êñ≠„ÄÇÂõ†‰∏∫ÔºåÂΩ≠ÂçöÁ§æÁªèÂ∏∏ÂèëÂ∏É‰∏Ä‰∫õÈÅìÂê¨ÈÄîËØ¥ÁöÑÊ∂àÊÅØÔºåÂ∞§ÂÖ∂ÈíàÂØπ‰∏≠ÂõΩÁöÑÊ∂àÊÅØÔºå‰∏çÂ∞ëÈÉΩÊòØÂ≠òÂú®ÊîøÊ≤ªÂÄæÂêëÔºåÁîöËá≥ÂÖÖÂΩìÁæéÂõΩÊîøÂ∫úËØ¨Èô∑‰∏≠ÂõΩÁöÑÊâìÊâãÔºåÂøÖÈ°ªÊ≠£Á°ÆÂà§Êñ≠ÂíåËÆ§ÁúüÊÄùËÄÉ„ÄÇ
‰ΩÜÊòØÔºå‰ªéËøôÂàôÊ∂àÊÅØ‰∏≠Ôºå‰πüÁúãÂà∞‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåÈÇ£Â∞±ÊòØ‰∏≠ÂõΩ‰ºÅ‰∏öÂú®ËäØÁâáÁöÑÈÄâÊã©‰∏äÔºå‰ºº‰πé‰ªçÁÑ∂ËøáÂ∫¶‰æùËµñÂ§ñÂõΩËäØÁâáÔºåËÄå‰∏çËÄÉËôëÂõΩ‰∫ßËäØÁâá„ÄÇ
‰∫ãÂÆû‰∏äÔºåÁâπÊúóÊôÆÊîøÂ∫úÂÖÅËÆ∏Ëã±‰ºüËææÂá∫Âè£Âà∞‰∏≠ÂõΩÁöÑËäØÁâáÔºåÊòØÈùûÂ∏∏‰ΩéÁ´ØÁöÑÔºå‰πüÊòØÂõΩ‰∫ßËäØÁâáÂÆåÂÖ®ÂèØ‰ª•Êõø‰ª£ÁöÑ„ÄÇÂè™ÊòØÔºåÂõΩÂÜÖ‰∏Ä‰∫õ‰ºÅ‰∏ö‰ªçÁÑ∂ÊÇ£ÊúâËøõÂè£ËäØÁâá‚Äú‰æùËµñÁóá‚ÄùÔºå‰∏çÊÑøÊÑèÈÄâÊã©ÂõΩ‰∫ßËäØÁâá„ÄÇËøôÁßçËøáÂ∫¶‰æùËµñËøõÂè£ËäØÁâáÁöÑÊØõÁóÖÔºå‰πüËÆ©ÂõΩ‰∫ßËäØÁâáÂà∂ÈÄ†ÂïÜÂæàÈöæÊäïÂÖ•Êõ¥Â§öÁöÑ‰∫∫Âäõ„ÄÅÁâ©ÂäõÂíåË¥¢ÂäõÂéªÁ†îÁ©∂ËäØÁâá„ÄÅÂà∂ÈÄ†ËäØÁâáÔºåÂæàÈöæÁúüÊ≠£ÊèêÈ´òÊàëÂõΩËäØÁâáÁöÑÂõΩÈôÖÁ´û‰∫âÂäõ„ÄÇ
ÁúãÂà∞ËøôÁßçÁé∞Ë±°ÔºåÁ¶Å‰∏ç‰ΩèËÆ©‰∫∫ÊÉ≥Ëµ∑ÂâçÂá†Âπ¥Âõ¥ÁªïËÅîÊÉ≥‰∏∫‰ªÄ‰πà‰∏çÁ†îÂèëÂà∂ÈÄ†ËäØÁâáÂ±ïÂºÄÁöÑËÆ®ËÆ∫Ôºå‰ª•ÂèäÂØπËÅîÊÉ≥Âíå Êü≥‰º†Âøó Á≠âÁöÑË¥®Áñë„ÄÅÊâπËØÑÂíåË∞¥Ë¥£ÔºåËÆ§‰∏∫ËÅîÊÉ≥ÊòØ‰∏ÄÂÆ∂Ê≤°ÊúâÁà±ÂõΩÊÉÖÊÄÄÁöÑ‰ºÅ‰∏öÔºåÊòØ‰∏ÄÂÆ∂Âè™Ê≥®ÈáçËá™Ë∫´Âà©ÁõäÁöÑ‰ºÅ‰∏ö„ÄÇ
ÈÇ£‰πàÔºåÈÇ£‰∫õÊâπËØÑËÅîÊÉ≥„ÄÅË∞¥Ë¥£ËÅîÊÉ≥ÁöÑ‰∫∫ÔºåÁâπÂà´ÊòØÂÖ∑Êúâ‰∏ÄÂÆöËØùËØ≠ÊùÉÁöÑ‰∫∫ÔºåÁé∞Âú®ËÉΩÂê¶Á´ôÂá∫Êù•ÂõûÂ∫î‰∏Ä‰∏ãÔºå‰∏∫‰ªÄ‰πà‰∏≠ÂõΩ‰ºÅ‰∏öÂÆÅÂèØ‰ΩøÁî®Ëã±‰ºüËææÁöÑ‰ΩéÁ´ØËäØÁâáÔºå‰πü‰∏ç‰ΩøÁî®ÂõΩ‰∫ßËäØÁâáÂë¢ÔºüÂú®ÂõΩÂÆ∂Â§ßÂäõÈºìÂä±‰ºÅ‰∏öËá™‰∏ªÂàõÊñ∞„ÄÅÈºìÂä±‰ºÅ‰∏öÈÄâÊã©‰ΩøÁî®ÂõΩ‰∫ßËäØÁâáÁöÑÂ§ßËÉåÊôØ‰∏ãÔºåÂæàÂ§ö‰ºÅ‰∏öËøòÊòØÂøÉÈáåÂè™ÊúâËã±‰ºüËææÁ≠âÂ§ñÂõΩ‰ºÅ‰∏öÔºå‰ªçÁÑ∂Âè™ÊÑøÊÑèÈÄâÁî®Ëã±‰ºüËææÁ≠âÂ§ñÂõΩ‰ºÅ‰∏öÁîü‰∫ßÁöÑËäØÁâáÔºåÂú®ÂΩìÂàùÊîøÁ≠ñÂíåÂà∂Â∫¶ÈÉΩÊ≤°ÊúâÈºìÂä±‰ºÅ‰∏ö‰ΩøÁî®ÂõΩ‰∫ß‰∫ßÂìÅ„ÄÅÈÉΩÂÅèÂêë‰∫éËøõÂè£‰∫ßÂìÅÁöÑÊÉÖÂÜµ‰∏ãÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúËÅîÊÉ≥ÁúüÁöÑÁ†îÂà∂ËäØÁâáÔºå‰πüÁ†îÂà∂Âá∫Êù•ÊØîËæÉÂ•ΩÁöÑËäØÁâáÔºåÁªìÊûú‰ºöÊÄéÊ†∑Âë¢Ôºü‰ºöÊúâÂ∏ÇÂú∫ÂêóÔºü
ÂèØ‰ª•ËøôÊ†∑ËØ¥ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúËÅîÊÉ≥Á†îÂà∂ËäØÁâáÔºå‰πüÂ∞±Ê≤°Êúâ‰ªäÂ§©ÁöÑËÅîÊÉ≥‰∫ÜÔºåËÅîÊÉ≥Êó©Â∞±ÂÖ≥Èó®‰∫ÜÔºå‰∏î‰∏çÊòØËÅîÊÉ≥Êú¨Ë∫´ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåËÄåÊòØÊï¥‰∏™ÁéØÂ¢ÉÈÉΩ‰∏çÊîØÊåÅËÅîÊÉ≥Á†îÂà∂ËäØÁâá„ÄÇ
ËøôÂ∞±ÊòØÁé∞ÂÆûÔºå‰πüÁªù‰∏çÊòØÈô¢Â£´ÊâÄËØ¥ÔºåÂè™Ë¶ÅËÆ§ÁúüÁ†îÂèëÔºåËÅîÊÉ≥Â∞±ËÉΩÁ†îÂà∂Âá∫ËäØÁâáÔºåÂ∞±‰∏ç‰ºö‰ªäÂ§©Â¶ÇÊ≠§Ë¢´Âä®„ÄÇËøô‰∏ÄÂàáÔºåÁÆóÁöÑÈÉΩÊòØÁêÜËÆ∫Ë¥¶ÔºåÊòØÊÉ≥ÂΩìÁÑ∂ÔºåÂÆûÈôÖÊÉÖÂÜµËøúÈùûÈô¢Â£´ÊÉ≥Ë±°ÁöÑÈÇ£‰πàÁÆÄÂçï„ÄÇËÅîÊÉ≥ÂèØ‰ª•ÊãøÂá∫ËäØÁâáÔºåÁîöËá≥Ë¥®Èáè‰∏ç‰Ωé‰∫éÂ§ñÂõΩ‰ºÅ‰∏öÁîü‰∫ßÁöÑËäØÁâá„ÄÇ‰ΩÜÊòØÔºå‰∏≠ÂõΩ‰ºÅ‰∏ö‰ªçÁÑ∂‰ºöÈÄâÊã©ËøõÂè£ËäØÁâá„ÄÇ
Â¥áÊ¥ãÂ™öÂ§ñÂú®Áõ∏ÂΩì‰∏ÄÈÉ®ÂàÜ‰ºÅ‰∏öÂíåÁªèËê•ËÄÖÂøÉÈáåÔºåÂ∑≤ÁªèÊâé‰∏ã‰∫ÜÊ†πÔºåÂæàÈöæÊ∏ÖÈô§„ÄÇÈô§ÈùûÂú®ÊîøÁ≠ñ‰∏äÊòéÁ°ÆË¶ÅÊ±ÇÔºåÂøÖÈ°ª‰ΩøÁî®ÂõΩ‰∫ßËäØÁâáÔºåÊâçÊúâÂèØËÉΩÂ∞ÜÂõΩ‰∫ßËäØÁâáÊé®ÂπøÂà∞‰ºÅ‰∏öÔºå‰∏îË¶ÅÊåÅÁª≠ÊîøÁ≠ñÊîØÊíë„ÄÅÊîøÁ≠ñÊé®Âä®ÔºåÂê¶ÂàôÔºåÂæàÂø´Âèà‰ºöË¢´‰ºÅ‰∏öÊäõÂºÉ„ÄÇ
Ëøô‰πüÊÑèÂë≥ÁùÄÔºåÂú®ËäØÁâáÈóÆÈ¢ò‰∏äÔºåÂπ∂‰∏çÊòØÂõΩÂÜÖ‰ºÅ‰∏öÂä†Â§ßÁ†îÂèë„ÄÅÂà∂ÈÄ†ÂäõÂ∫¶Ôºå‰∏≠ÂõΩËäØÁâáÂ∞±ËÉΩ‰∏éËøõÂè£ËäØÁâáÁ´û‰∫âÔºåÂõΩÂÜÖ‰ºÅ‰∏ö‰ΩøÁî®ÂõΩ‰∫ßËäØÁâáÁöÑÁÉ≠ÊÉÖÔºåÂØπÂõΩÂÜÖ‰ºÅ‰∏öÁ†îÂèë„ÄÅÂà∂ÈÄ†ËäØÁâá‰πüÂçÅÂàÜÈáçË¶Å„ÄÇÂ¶ÇÊûú‰æõÈúÄ‰∏çÂçèË∞ÉÔºåÂõΩÂÜÖ‰ºÅ‰∏öÁ†îÂèëÂíåÂà∂ÈÄ†ËäØÁâáÁöÑÁßØÊûÅÊÄßÊòØÈöæ‰ª•Ë∞ÉÂä®Ëµ∑Êù•ÁöÑÔºåËÅîÊÉ≥ÂΩìÂàù‰∏çÁ†îÂèëËäØÁâáÔºå‰πüÊòØËø´‰∫éÊó†Â•àÔºåËÄå‰∏çÊòØËÅîÊÉ≥‰∏çÊÉ≥Á†îÂà∂ËäØÁâá„ÄÇÂØπËÅîÊÉ≥‰∏çÁ†îÂà∂ËäØÁâáÁöÑÊâπËØÑ„ÄÅÊåáË¥£ÔºåÊõ¥ÊòØ‰∏çÂÖ¨Âπ≥ÁöÑ„ÄÇ

author: Redacci√≥n
title: San Luis Potos√≠ se pinta de verde: Despenaliza el aborto hasta las 12 semanas de gestaci√≥n
text:
Con 20 votos a favor, 4 en contra y 0 abstenciones, el Congreso de San Luis Potos√≠ aval√≥ este jueves [despenalizar el aborto](https://www.elfinanciero.com.mx/salud/2023/09/22/dia-de-accion-global-por-la-despenalizacion-del-aborto-por-que-abortar-es-un-derecho-humano/)[ ](https://www.elfinanciero.com.mx/cdmx/2024/11/04/avanza-en-congreso-de-cdmx-la-despenalizacion-total-del-aborto-de-que-va-la-iniciativa/)en el estado hasta las 12 semanas de gestaci√≥n, convirti√©ndose en la entidad n√∫mero 16 en eliminar este delito en M√©xico.
Lo anterior, luego de que legisladores aprobaron modificar los art√≠culos 148 fracciones I y II, art√≠culo 149 y 150 fracci√≥n III del C√≥digo Penal del Estado de San Luis Potos√≠, en relaci√≥n a la[ interrupci√≥n legal del embarazo](https://www.elfinanciero.com.mx/salud/2023/03/02/dia-de-la-mujer-2023-aborto-legal-en-mexico-dudas-interrupcion-legal-del-embarazo/).
De acuerdo con el portal del Congreso de San Luis Potos√≠, con esta modificaci√≥n, se derogan las disposiciones para dejar de penalizar la interrupci√≥n del embarazo de la mujer o persona gestante hasta antes de las 12 semanas de gestaci√≥n.
‚Äî Congreso SLP (@CongresoEdoSLP)
[#√öltimoMomento][pic.twitter.com/tHIFVpGjaw][November 7, 2024]
‚ÄúCon este dictamen se da cumplimiento a la sentencia de fecha 20 de septiembre de 2024, dictada por el Juez Tercero de Distrito en el Estado de San Luis Potos√≠ dentro del Juicio de Amparo 765/2024; as√≠ como a la iniciativa consignada bajo el turno 3763, materia de la sentencia de fecha 23 de agosto de 2024, dictada por el Tribunal Electoral del Estado de San Luis Potos√≠ en el Juicio para la Protecci√≥n de los Derechos Pol√≠tico-Electorales del Ciudadano dentro del expediente TESLP/JDC/94/2024‚Ä≥.
Por la ma√±ana, la Comisi√≥n Primera de Justicia, presidida por la legisladora Mar√≠a Leticia V√°zquez Hern√°ndez, aprob√≥ el dictamen para despenalizar el aborto en el estado y, posteriormente, la propuesta fue enviada al pleno esta tarde donde fue aprobada inmediatamente.
Organizaciones feministas, activistas y defensoras de los [derechos reproductivos ](https://www.elfinanciero.com.mx/tags/derechos-reproductivos/)aplaudieron esta decisi√≥n y pidieron seguir la lucha por la justicia reproductiva de mujeres y personas gestantes.
En cumplimiento de la sentencia emitida por el Juzgado Tercero de Distrito en el Estado de San Luis Potos√≠, el Congreso local despenaliz√≥ el aborto durante las primeras 12 semanas de gestaci√≥n.
‚Äî GIRE (@GIRE_mx)
¬°Hoy San Luis Potos√≠ tiene[#AbortoLegal]! üíö[#QueSubaLaMarea][#JusticiaReproductiva][pic.twitter.com/Q0U95eRXaD][November 7, 2024]
San Luis Potos√≠ se pinta de verde al despenalizar el aborto hasta las 12 semanas de gestaci√≥n. Un triunfo m√°s en la lucha por los derechos reproductivos de las mujeres y las personas gestantes.
‚Äî Inmujeres M√©xico (@inmujeres)
La autonom√≠a, la libertad y la justicia siguen ganando terreno en M√©xico. üíö[pic.twitter.com/nbpRtixDKr][November 7, 2024]
Este jueves, la [Suprema Corte de Justicia de la Naci√≥n (SCJN)](https://www.elfinanciero.com.mx/nacional/2023/09/06/suprema-corte-despenaliza-el-aborto-en-todo-mexico/) se qued√≥ a un voto de despenalizar el [aborto en Chiapas](https://www.elfinanciero.com.mx/nacional/2024/11/07/suprema-corte-ordena-despenalizar-el-aborto-en-chiapas/), aunque orden√≥ al Congreso local legislar para dejar sin efectos algunos art√≠culos del C√≥digo Penal que lo consideran un delito. Para ello, le dio como plazo a m√°s tardar el 30 de junio del pr√≥ximo a√±o.
Actualmente, el art√≠culo 181 del C√≥digo Penal de Chiapas solo permite el aborto en casos de violaci√≥n, cuando la persona embarazada corre peligro de muerte o si el producto sufre alteraciones gen√©ticas o cong√©nitas. En caso de no presentar los dict√°menes m√©dicos que corroboren estos casos, la persona que practique un aborto o aquella que lo solicite recibir√° una pena de 1 a 3 a√±os de prisi√≥n.
Sin embargo, este jueves, la Suprema Corte resolvi√≥ que esta disposici√≥n queda invalidada por afectar los derechos reproductivos de las mujeres y personas gestantes (personas transg√©nero y no binarias).
‚Äî Suprema Corte (@SCJN)
[#LaCorte]invalid√≥ un art√≠culo del C√≥digo Penal de Chiapas por no permitir la interrupci√≥n del embarazo durante las primeras 12 semanas y limitar la posibilidad de realizar el aborto a supuestos muy espec√≠ficos[https://t.co/p3LrLKmM2q][pic.twitter.com/x8DbUedDfc][November 7, 2024]
Urgen al Congreso de CDMX discutir la despenalizaci√≥n total del aborto
Organizaciones civiles demandaron al Congreso de la Ciudad de M√©xico discutir la iniciativa para la[ despenalizaci√≥n total del aborto ](https://www.elfinanciero.com.mx/cdmx/2024/11/07/fuera-el-aborto-del-codigo-penal-colectivas-feministas-exigen-despenalizacion-total-en-cdmx/)este jueves, como se ten√≠a previsto antes de que se frenara su debate de √∫ltimo minuto la noche del mi√©rcoles.
Sof√≠a Gardu√±o, vocera del Fondo de Aborto para la Justicia Social Mar√≠a, advirti√≥ de la importancia que el dictamen que se aval√≥ el lunes en las comisiones legislativas no sea desechado ni se vaya a ‚Äúla congeladora‚Äù, es decir, que se pause su discusi√≥n.
‚ÄùHoy venimos a exigirle al Congreso de la Ciudad de M√©xico que saque el aborto del C√≥digo Penal‚Äù, urgi√≥ Gardu√±o.
El lunes, las Comisiones Unidas de Administraci√≥n y Procuraci√≥n de Justicia y de Igualdad de G√©nero del Legislativo capitalino aprobaron la iniciativa que elimina el plazo para interrumpir legalmente el embarazo antes de la semana 12 de gestaci√≥n.
La propuesta, presentada el 10 de octubre pasado por la diputada Yuriri Ayala, del partido Morena, busca eliminar el delito de [aborto](https://www.elfinanciero.com.mx/tags/aborto/) del art√≠culo 76 del C√≥digo Penal local, y plantea la derogaci√≥n de los art√≠culos 144, 145, 147 y 148, que criminalizan el aborto despu√©s de las 12 semanas de embarazo.
Con informaci√≥n de EFE.
